title: Perform an Interactive Rebase (Challenge)
description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to manage their codebase efficiently. One of the most useful features of Git is interactive rebase, which allows developers to modify the commit history of a branch. In this challenge, you will learn how to perform an interactive rebase using Git.

meta.title: Perform an Interactive Rebase: A Git Mastery Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to clean up your Git commit history using interactive rebase, a powerful feature of the Git version control system.
meta.keywords: version control, git labs, git, commit history, interactive rebase, git playground, code management

verify.name: Verify for successful interaction
